ngiemboon: Lepʉ̌ Mǒonsê zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ jʉ́jʉ́ŋ shúm mbòŋo sie e Ssé la gÿo páʼ é ge láʼ tó, é téen ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ kwàʼ sɛ̌ shúm wɔ́. Áa mmó gie á gÿo, ngwɔ́ lepʉ̌ ŋwɛ́ le lɔgɔ nò pwɔʼ gẅie á ne ńzɛ́te ngie mé lɔg ńtóo mvfò Ssé ngùʼ ntsèm, é ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tàʼ ntí, ńdɔg ńgÿo epʉ̀a pie é ne ńtsɔ́ɔn létsóte nnɛ́ né lejʉ́ŋ Ssé, kuʼu légwɔ́ pate lɔ̌ʼ wɔ́.
en: Since the law has only a shadow of the good things   to come, and not the reality itself of those things, it can never perfect the worshipers by the same sacrifices they continually offer year after year.

ngiemboon: Á laa péʼe lenùŋe pwɔʼ mvfò Ssé na yɛ̌ ntí, à kẅile lɔ̌ʼ na pʉ̀a tà ntʉ́m wɔ́b té gíŋ ńŋaga wɔ́b na tsɔ́ nò wɔ́, mbà mé ée ńcʉ́ʼʉ ńnuŋe tsɔ́ pwɔʼ wɔ́.
en: Otherwise, wouldn’t they have stopped being offered, since the worshipers, purified once and for all, would no longer have any consciousness of sins?

ngiemboon: Mé lɔɔn ńcwoŋo ńdíe mboŋó, mbà yɛ̌ ntí lenùŋe pwɔʼ aa legwɔ̌ ngùʼ ntsèm ńkímte mbwó pʉ̀a mesoŋ ngie pɔ́ ée pʉ̀a tepòŋ.
en: But in the sacrifices there is a reminder of sins year after year.

ngiemboon: Á nue atsɔ̌ legwɔ́ gẅie à lɔɔn ngwɔ́ metse melúm mefòŋ mbɔɔ mé mekùkwòon fó na nyìŋ mesoŋ ńzyɛ́b menò tepòŋ, á té wó wɔ́.
en: For it is impossible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á la gÿo Keleto gwaa tóo tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó, ńgɔɔn mbwó Ssé ngie:
en: Therefore, as he was coming into the world, he said:

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ te kwoŋ pwɔʼ gẅie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wɔ́,
en: You did not delight

ngiemboon: Á cʉa púʼu, n gɔɔn ngie: “Wɔ́ɔn wɔɔn, mbà Ssé, n ne ńtóo légÿo mmó gie ɔ̀ ne ńkwoŋo.
en: Then I said, “See —

ngiemboon: À zɔɔn ḿvɔg ńgɔɔn ngie: «Ɔ̀ te kwoŋ pwɔʼ wɔ́, ńké te kwoŋo mmó gie mé lɔg ńtóo mvfò gù wɔ́, ńké te kwoŋo nɔ̀ɔn gẅie mé tuɔ tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wɔ́, ńké te kwoŋ pwɔʼ gẅie mé nuŋe mvfò gù ńtí nò tepòŋ wɔ́, esɛ̌ shúm té gú poŋ, tá é ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ shúm sie lepʉ̌ ne ńzɛ́te ngie mé gÿo.»
en: After he says above, You did not desire or delight in sacrifices and offerings, whole burnt offerings and sin offerings (which are offered according to the law  ),

ngiemboon: Keleto pɔ́ɔnte ńgɔɔn ngie: «Wɔ́ɔn wɔɔn, n ne ńtóo légÿo mmó gie ɔ̀ ne ńkwoŋo.»
en: he then says, See, I have come to do your will.    He takes away the first to establish the second.

ngiemboon: Keleto la gÿo mmó gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo. À la náa twó mbùm yé tàʼ legʉ̀a á kuʼ. Á lɔg púʼu, ńgÿo peg kuʼu légwɔ́ pʉ̀a Ssé.
en: By this will, we have been sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all time.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na nùŋepwɔʼ we nzẅìŋe kʉ̀a, mbà à gwɔ́ lyɛ̌ʼ ntsèm, ńtyé pɔ́ ncwò fàʼ yé, ńké ńnuŋe pɔ́ tàʼ ntí pwɔʼ gẅie ngwɔ́ é le láʼa tsɔ́ lyɛ̌ʼ ńkuʼu léfó na nyìŋ ńzyɛ́b menò tepòŋ mé wɔ́.
en: Every priest stands day after day ministering and offering the same sacrifices time after time, which can never take away sins.

ngiemboon: Tá á ké ńgʉa na Keleto, mbà à la nuŋe pwɔʼ ńtí menò tepòŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ, á tàʼ legʉ̀a á kuʼ pɔ́ ndàʼndàʼ. Á gʉa sẅɛ́ʼ ńnéŋe na gwoŋó pwó Ssé yetʉ̀, pɔ́ ndàʼndàʼ.
en: But this man, after offering one sacrifice for sins forever, sat down at the right hand of God.  ,# 10:12 Rm 8:34; Eph 1:20; Col 3:1; Heb 1:3; 8:1; 12:2; 1Pt 3:22

ngiemboon: Aa jʉʼó tà ńkú fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, ńne ńzẅíʼte ngie Ssé lɔg megàŋmbù pé, ńgÿo ntÿɔgɔ́ mekwò mé.
en: He is now waiting until his enemies are made his footstool.

ngiemboon: Wɔɔn aa páʼ à la lɔg pɔ́ tàʼa mmó wémɔʼɔ́ gẅie à nǎa mbwó Ssé, ńgÿo epʉ̀a pie é zẅɛ́ʼɛ yé, é kuʼu légwɔ́ pʉ̀a Ssé, ńgwɔ́ pate lɔ̌ʼ pɔ́ ndàʼndàʼ.
en: For by one offering he has perfected forever those who are sanctified.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie à Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gíŋ ńne shwóŋo wégè ngie áa nò. Á vɔg ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: The Holy Spirit also testifies to us about this. For after he says:

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔ̌ɔn ngie:
en: This is the covenant I will make with them

ngiemboon: Ńgíŋ ḿbɔ́ɔnte ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: andI will never again remember

ngiemboon: Á ké ńzɔɔn ńgʉa na fʉ̀ʼ gie, e Ssé vɔ̌g tà ńdege mefʉa nyìŋ ńnáa mbwó yé, angàŋ te gíŋ ńtóo mvfò Ssé ńnáa tsɔ́ mmó ńtí menò tepòŋ wɔ́.
en: Now where there is forgiveness of these, there is no longer an offering for sin.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ pɔ́ɔn, páʼ áa púʼu la, pege ee fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, ńkwaʼ ne ńzsé mboŋó ngie atsɔ́ mmó cʉ́ʼʉ ńne ńtáte wégè lécʉa ńkúu kwàʼ jʉʼʉ ndʉalʉ̌a wɔ́, púʼu, ńzẅɛ́ʼɛ páʼ Yěsô la pfɛte metse mé.
en: Therefore, brothers and sisters, since we have boldness to enter the sanctuary through the blood of Jesus    #— #

ngiemboon: À la shʉa máamáa pàga nzsǒ gie mé la lɔg ńtsɛ́ nzsè lékúu kwàʼ jʉʼʉ ssé, ńdɔg púʼu, ńtsɔ́ʼɔ mánzsè gẅie pege ge pfó mǒ, é kúu jʉʼ gie Ssé ee wó. Á gwɔ́ mánzsè wesẅé gẅie pege ge cʉa mǒ é gwɔ́ wó. Máamáa pàga nzsǒ gie à la shʉa, e gwɔ̌ pɔ́ mbùm nnɛ́ ye gie mé la kime na tÿǒnkǐ.
en: he has inaugurated   for us a new and living way through the curtain (that is, through his flesh  # 10:20 Jn 10:9; Heb 9:3,8) #— #

ngiemboon: Pege lɔgɔ púʼu, ńgẅiin nùŋepwɔʼ welÿò gẅie aa kwàʼ wɛ̌, yé zɔ̌ líe pʉ̀a Ssé.
en: and since we have a great high priest over the house of God,

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, pege gwaa sẅɛʼte nnɛ́ né lejʉ́ŋ Ssé, ńgẅiin ntʉ́m gẅie ée nénʉ́, ḿbiŋ ńzáb ntʉ́m na Ssé kwàʼ mboŋó, á nue Yěsô ka lɔg metse mé ésɔg letʉ́m ségè, tà é té gíŋ ńne ńŋaga wégè wɔ́, à ka lɔg ntse gẅie é ne ńdʉ́ate ésɔg mbùm yege.
en: let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, with our hearts sprinkled clean from an evil conscience and our bodies washed in pure water.

ngiemboon: E Ssé ka kaʼa mmó mbwó pege. Aa ḿbiŋe ńkaʼa mmó, ńdáʼa ńgÿo pɔ́ yɛ̌. Púʼu la, pege ké ńne ńkẅiʼi shʉashʉa ńgɔɔn ngie, pege ne ńzẅíʼte mmó gie à la kaʼ tà pege le ne ḿmʉ́ʼte wɔ́.
en: Let us hold on to the confession of our hope without wavering, since he who promised is faithful.

ngiemboon: Tà nyìŋ wege gwáʼa lÿɔ̀g á lélíe fɛ̌ we, á gíŋ ńdíe yé yé, ńzsé ngie pege ge lɔg púʼu, é kẅiŋte membùm mégè na legẅiin nkwòŋe mbɔɔ na lefaʼ mefàʼ mbòŋo.
en: And let us consider one another in order to provoke love and good works,

ngiemboon: Tà pege nyé léké ńne ńtóo mecúʼtè mégè tǒ, tà mbɔɔ páʼ letsǒ cúʼtè kéen ńcʉ́ʼʉ mà mbwó tsɔ́ pʉ̀a la, tà ńcʉ́ʼ púʼu, nyìŋ wege kẅiŋte fɛ̌ we, á kẅiŋte yé yé, á nue pi ne ńgyá páʼ lyɛʼɛ́ láʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ḿbɔ́ɔnte.
en: not neglecting to gather together, as some are in the habit of doing, but encouraging each other,   and all the more as you see the day approaching.

ngiemboon: Mé lɔɔn ńzɔɔn ńnyɛɛ wégè nò nénʉ́ tà pege ne ńzsé mboŋó, ḿbiŋ ńgwáʼ, ńké ńgÿo pɔ́ nò tepòŋ tà ńne ńzsé zsě, mbà tsɔ́ pwɔʼ ndyɛ̀ʼɛ gẅie ngwɔ́ mé nuŋe lélɔg ńzyɛ́b menò tepòŋ mégè, é té gíŋ ńgwɔ́ wó wɔ́.
en: For if we deliberately go on sinning after receiving the knowledge of the truth, there no longer remains a sacrifice for sins,

ngiemboon: Pege cʉ̌ʼ ńgẅiin pɔ́ légwaa zẅíʼte mmó gie á ne ńtóo, ńgíŋe ńne ḿvɛɛ, yɛ̌ mmó gwɔ́ ngie mé ge gÿo ŋag pʉ̀a mesoŋ mbɔɔ ngie, nkʉ̀ʼʉ pà mmɔ̌g ge gÿo tuɔ patʉʉ twó mbwó Ssé.
en: but a terrifying expectation of judgment and the fury of a fire about to consume the adversaries.

ngiemboon: Mé zɔɔn ńzsé ngie, nyìŋ lɔɔn fʉa lepʉ̌ Mǒonsê, mé zẅé ngàŋ té tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mé, páʼ pajÿòngyá mépʉ́a kà métá wɔ́ɔ, é lɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie áa nò.
en: Anyone who disregarded the law of Moses died without mercy, based on the testimony of two or three witnesses.

ngiemboon: Tà á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ púʼu, mbà pi kwǎŋ gí ngie ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gie á ne ńzɛ́te ngie mé zába twó nyìŋ gẅie à lɔgɔ́ Míŋ Ssé ńtóŋ sɛ̌ shúm, e ge láʼ gwáʼa la? Mé gɔɔn nyìŋ gẅie à gwagá nò metse mie Ssé lɔgɔ ńgwaa kʉ̀a, é gwɔ́ mie mé la lɔg ńgÿo á cʉ́ʼʉ nyìŋ Ssé, á nyìŋ gẅie à zoonté Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gie á gÿo pege zsé páʼ ntʉ́m Ssé poŋo nzèm pege púʼu.
en: How much worse punishment do you think one will deserve who has trampled on the Son of God, who has regarded as profane   the blood of the covenant by which he was sanctified, and who has insulted the Spirit of grace?  # 10:29 Mt 12:31–32; Eph 4:30; Heb 6:6

ngiemboon: Pege zɔɔn ńcwoŋo ne ńzsé nyìŋ gẅie à la gɔɔn ngie: «Mèŋ zɔ gẅiin létsɔ́ʼɔ nò tepòŋ ńnáa tsɔ́, mèŋ zɔ gẅiin lépéen wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ na fàʼ yé.» À la gíŋ ńgɔɔn ngie: «Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge gÿo ŋag pʉ̀a pé.»
en: For we know the one who has said,

ngiemboon: Ammó gie ngwɔ́ nyìŋ néŋe ḿbɔ́g tɛʼ, aa légwe ntsaŋ á mvfò Ssé gie ee ntʉ̀ntʉ̀!
en: It is a terrifying thing to fall into the hands of the living God.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, tà pi lege páʼ á laa na mendùŋmvfò melyɛ̌ʼ, á na páʼ pi la gwɔ́ tà Ssé lɔgɔ kyɛ̀ʼ ńkyɛʼɛ gẅí, pi gyá ngɔ́ʼ tɛʼ. Mé maʼa gẅí lé ncù tɛʼ, tá pi ké shÿɔg shÿɔg.
en: Remember the earlier days when, after you had been enlightened, you endured a hard struggle with sufferings.

ngiemboon: Mé ne ńtyé mvfò láʼ ńzoon gẅí, ńkʉ́e gẅí, pi gíŋe ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ cʉanò ńtí nue pi ne ńtága nzèm pʉ̀a pie mé ne ńgege wɔ́b páʼ pi.
en: Sometimes you were publicly exposed to taunts and afflictions, and at other times you were companions of those who were treated that way.

ngiemboon: Megàŋatsǎŋ la ne ńgyá ngɔ́ʼ, pi kú gí nùɔ pɔ́b. Afʉ̀ʼ gie mé la gwoon shúm sí ńkẅé, pi lɔg pɔ́ lekág ńzẅíŋ mé kẅé, á nue pi la ne ńzsé ngie pi gẅiin tsɔ́ shúm é gwɔ́ sie é poŋ ńcʉa sɛ̌, ḿbiŋ ńgwɔ́ sie é ge láʼa gwɔ́ pɔ́ wó.
en: For you sympathized with the prisoners   and accepted with joy the confiscation of your possessions, because you know that you yourselves have a better and enduring possession.  # 10:34 Other mss add in heaven,# 10:34 Mt 5:12; 1Pt 1:4–5

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, tà pi kʉ́a lézáb ntʉ́m na Ssé, á nue máamáa ntsɔʼɔ́fàʼ aa mǒ.
en: So don’t throw away your confidence, which has a great reward.

ngiemboon: Á zɔɔn ńne ńzɛ́te ngie pi ké ńkag pɔ́ tʉ̀, ńzsé ngie pi ge ne gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie e Ssé ne ńkwoŋo, à fó púʼu, pi gẅiin mmó gie à la kaʼa lénáa mbwó pi.
en: For you need endurance, so that after you have done God’s will, you may receive what was promised.

ngiemboon: Á zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ Ŋwàʼne Ssé, mbà mé la ŋweʼe ngie:
en: For yet in a very little while,

ngiemboon: Awɔɔn nyìŋ gẅie n gyǎ ngie aa ndʉŋndʉŋ mvfò mèŋ,
en: But my righteous one    will live by faith;

ngiemboon: Tá á ké ńgʉa na pege, mbà pege te ntí pʉ̀a pie é fóo nùɔ pʉ̀a Keleto ńkẅɛɛ ńkúu pyé wɔ́. Pege ee páʼɔɔn ńzába ntʉ́m na Ssé, à cʉa púʼu, à gÿo ńgÿo pege tsẅɛ́.
en: But we are not those who draw back and are destroyed, but those who have faith and are saved.
